1122683150256283648.text:
Both librarian movies I saw this weekend--Change the Subject and The Public--featured clips from this goofy public domain vocational film from 1947 about choosing librarianship as a profession. Thanks @footage and @internetarchive
https://archive.org/details/0048LibrarianThe00003900 …pic.twitter.com/p1iFRahHZa

1123440986330365952.text: Good things: Learning to use Audacity, uploading my first live show to @internetarchive, metadata, the new @worldinfernofs album announcement, metadata, past Liz made soup.

1122831139268386818.text: OK folks, time to experiment. For fun, I uploaded ALL of @PLOS to @internetarchive (5.2Gb, XML). It's now available as a torrent, which means we can start seeding and sharing that knowledge all around the world. Who will join me? https://archive.org/details/allofplos_xml … @Lambo #openscience

1123276606250733568.text:
Questions about DWeb Camp? Our 1st Open Dialogue call is tmrw Wed 5/1, 11am PT / 2pm ET/ 7pm CET. We'll meet here: https://meet.jit.si/dwebcamp 
Come bounce your project ideas off of us, ask logistical questions, and maybe find collaborators.
https://github.com/dweb-camp-2019/organizing#open-dialogue-calls …pic.twitter.com/H8QUtASqFt

1123283538608943104.text:
The Internet Archive is dedicated to providing everyone with access to knowledge—for free. If you want to use your talents and skills to further this mission, we are hiring a team member in Development (aka Fundraising) to help run our Email Campaigns. 
https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/1247819473/ …pic.twitter.com/E8ubSRf0fz

1123008848028037120.text: Tomorrow at the Internet Archive: come learn how to take control of your personal data! #DWebMeetUp SF is hosting a nite of talks, demos and workshops about decentralized identity from @timberners_lee's SOLID/Inrupt, @marknadal Privacy Party & @GETJolocom. https://www.eventbrite.com/e/decentralized-web-sf-meet-upapril-tickets-60842622923 …pic.twitter.com/VDkjRV41Ug
